SELECT RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE , FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID, BBS_READ_CNT FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNM, RECIPE_CODE AS RECIPE_CODE, RECIPE_NAME AS RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_QNT AS RECIPE_QNT, RECIPE_TIME AS RECIPE_TIME, NATION_CODE AS NATION_CODE, FOOD_CODE AS FOOD_CODE, REG_DATE AS REG_DATE, RECIPE_INTRO AS RECIPE_INTRO, RECIPE_IMAGE AS RECIPE_IMAGE, USER_ID AS USER_ID, BBS_READ_CNT AS BBS_READ_CNT FROM ( SELECT RECOUA.RECIPE_CODE AS FIND_RECIPE_CODE FROM(SELECT RECIPE_CODE,COUNT(*) AS RECOU FROM RECIPE_IRDNT WHERE IRDNT_TYPE_CODE = 3060001 GROUP BY RECIPE_CODE) RECOUA, (SELECT RECIPE_CODE,COUNT(*) AS MYC FROM (SELECT DISTINCT * FROM (SELECT DISTINCT * FROM (SELECT IRDNT_NAME, TO_NUMBER(FRIDGE_IRDNT_AMOUNT) AS MYA FROM MY_FRIDGE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) MY, (SELECT DISTINCT TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(IRDNT_AMOUNT,'g'))AS RA, RECIPE_CODE, IRDNT_NAME FROM RECIPE_IRDNT WHERE IRDNT_TYPE_CODE = 3060001) RE WHERE RE.IRDNT_NAME = MY.IRDNT_NAME AND MYA > RA) GROUP BY RECIPE_CODE) MC WHERE RECOU = MYC AND RECOUA.RECIPE_CODE = MC.RECIPE_CODE) A, RECIPE_INFO B WHERE RECIPE_CODE =FIND_RECIPE_CODE ORDER BY RECIPE_NAME ASC) WHERE 1=1 AND RNM>=#{startRow} AND RNM <=#{endRow} AND RECIPE_NAME LIKE'%' || #{searchValue} ||'%'
